casebody.data:
Kamal DIAS, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS, Respondent. No. 06-3309. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 8, 2007.

Before LOURIE, RADER, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

. JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
